subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football
lead_paragraph: Jace Amaro, taken 49th, is the latest addition to a meager offense overhauled by the arrivals of Eric Decker, the top free-agent receiver, and the running back Chris Johnson.
snippet: Jace Amaro, taken 49th, is the latest addition to a meager offense overhauled by the arrivals of Eric Decker, the top free-agent receiver, and the running back Chris Johnson.
